## [Private Capital with Joe Reilly](https://www.circulus.co/episodes/ken-kencel-president-and-ceo-o)

July 7, 2024

New York, July 7th, 2024 – Ken Kencel is the President & CEO of Churchill Asset Management, a $50 billion dollar platform serving over 700 institutional clients. He shared valuable insights on the growing private credit market, the evolution of the industry, his first job at Drexel, working at Carlyle and then going out on his own to start Churchill from scratch. We also discuss the nuances of the art of the covenent and finish with Ken’s desert island discs.

## [Churchill Asset Management Named 2024 Lender Firm of the Year by The M&A Advisor](https://www.churchillam.com/press-release/churchill-asset-management-named-2024-lender-firm-of-the-year-by-the-ma-advisor/)

New York, NY, November 25, 2024 – Churchill Asset Management LLC (“Churchill” or the “Firm”), an investment specialist of Nuveen, announced today that it was named 2024 “Lender Firm of the Year” by The M&A Advisor. The Firm was honored at the 23rd Annual M&A Advisor Awards Gala held in New York City on November 20, 2024.

New York, November 4, 2024 – Churchill Asset Management and Arcmont Asset Management, the U.S. and European asset management companies of Nuveen Private Capital (“NPC”), today announced Katherine Elmore-Jones has joined as a Partner and Head of Private Equity Business Development in Europe.

New York, NY, November 25, 2024 – Churchill Asset Management LLC (“Churchill” or the “Firm”), an investment specialist of Nuveen, announced today that it was named 2024 “Lender Firm of the Year” by The M&A Advisor. The Firm was honored at the 23rd Annual M&A Advisor Awards Gala held in New York City on November 20, 2024.

[Read Full Article »](https://www.churchillam.com/press-release/churchill-asset-management-named-2024-lender-firm-of-the-year-by-the-ma-advisor/)

[![](https://www.churchillam.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/MG_3630_philpott_anne-e1678805850510.jpg)](https://www.churchillam.com/press-release/churchills-anne-philpott-named-to-wsj-pro-private-equitys-2024-women-to-watch-list/)

## [Churchill’s Anne Philpott Named to WSJ Pro Private Equity’s 2024 Women To Watch List](https://www.churchillam.com/press-release/churchills-anne-philpott-named-to-wsj-pro-private-equitys-2024-women-to-watch-list/)

New York, NY, November 18, 2024 – Churchill Asset Management LLC (“Churchill” or the “Firm”), an investment specialist of Nuveen, announced today that Anne Philpott, Managing Director, Junior Capital & Private Equity Solutions (“PEJC”), has been named to WSJ Pro Private Equity’s 2024 Women to Watch List.

[Read Full Article »](https://www.churchillam.com/press-release/churchills-anne-philpott-named-to-wsj-pro-private-equitys-2024-women-to-watch-list/)

## [Nuveen Private Capital Appoints Katherine Elmore-Jones to Lead Private Equity Business Development in Europe](https://www.churchillam.com/press-release/nuveen-private-capital-appoints-katherine-elmore-jones-to-lead-private-equity-business-development-in-europe/)

New York, November 4, 2024 – Churchill Asset Management and Arcmont Asset Management, the U.S. and European asset management companies of Nuveen Private Capital (“NPC”), today announced Katherine Elmore-Jones has joined as a Partner and Head of Private Equity Business Development in Europe. 

[Read Full Article »](https://www.churchillam.com/press-release/nuveen-private-capital-appoints-katherine-elmore-jones-to-lead-private-equity-business-development-in-europe/)

article/570667/us-cso50-2022-awards-showcase-world-class-security-strategies.html Investing involves risk; principal loss is possible. Debt or fixed income securities are subject to market risk, credit risk, interest rate risk,
12 Long-standing annual assessments and audits by independent auditors. call risk, derivatives risk, dollar roll transaction risk and income risk. As interest rates rise, bond prices fall. Below investment grade or
high yield debt securities are subject to liquidity risk and heightened credit risk.
Foreign investments involve additional risks, including currency fluctuation, political and economic instability, lack of liquidity and
differing legal and accounting standards. Please note investments in private debt, including leveraged loans, middle market loans, and
mezzanine debt, are subject to various risk factors, including credit risk, liquidity risk and interest rate risk.
Nuveen, LLC provides investment solutions through its investment specialists. Churchill Asset Management is a registered investment advisor and an affiliate
of Nuveen, LLC.

links.title: The Lead Left newsletter
links.content:
[Skip to content](#content)

  * # [Churchill Asset Management](https://www.churchillam.com)

  * ## From Nuveen




#  The Lead Left

_The Lead Left_ is our industry-leading capital markets newsletter and the premier source for information on trends in the middle market finance space. It is distributed weekly to over 48,000 readers in financial services.

![Lead left logo white](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201147%20468'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

![Lead left laptop](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20868%20600'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

##  The Lead Left is the leading source of original research on the middle market asset class.

Its research, data, and industry interviews are read by hundreds of senior decision makers among the top providers of debt financing to middle market companies as well as investors in middle market senior loans and private equity sponsors. Since 2008,  _The Lead Left_ has been a well-respected resource for top U.S. private equity firms.

[ Visit Lead Left ](https://www.theleadleft.com/)

##  Features

[ ](https://www.theleadleft.com/category/commentary/)

### [Commentary](https://www.theleadleft.com/category/commentary/)

Original commentary backed by thirty years of capital markets experience

[ ](https://www.theleadleft.com/category/interview/)

### [Interviews](https://www.theleadleft.com/category/interview/)

Interviews with top decision makers in banking, private equity, & credit investing

[ ](https://www.theleadleft.com/features/)

### [Market Data & Analysis](https://www.theleadleft.com/features/)

Data and commentary from the leading global capital markets research firms

[ ](https://www.theleadleft.com/category/chart-of-the-week/)

### [Trending Charts & Deals](https://www.theleadleft.com/category/chart-of-the-week/)

Detailed information on deals in the market plus our popular charts and quotes of the week

[ ](https://www.theleadleft.com/library/)

### [Research](https://www.theleadleft.com/library/)

One-stop source for info, research, & white papers on middle market finance
